WorkItem.ClosedComment: Judging from the Quick n Dirty math that I was just doing, if you take off the Improved Commanding Shout your health drops to 51817, which sounds like that was the problem. You had the improved other stuff, just not Imp Comm Shout.
WorkItem.Description:
In attached gear set w\o buffs ingame HP number matches Rawr prediction - 40k
Under the following raid buffs: BoK, Imp. PW: Fortitute, Imp. MotW, Imp. Commanding Shout, 40 stam food, and Flask of Stoneblood Rawr states I should have 52379 hp, but ingame I have only 51.8k.

Comments.Message: Are you 100% sure that your Fort/MotW that you're receiving in-game are the Imp versions?
Yes I'm sure. IMotW was 52 stam and Fort - 214. Stamina numbers ingame and in Rawr is the same - 4104 and 4103 (rounding error, I guess). But HP differs.
